samples.context: Scientists are working on developing some alternate energy sources so that dependency on coal and petroleum can be reduced. Some examples are given below: Solar energy is being used to produce electricity at many places.
samples.question: What are scientists working on developing?

samples.context: Solar energy is being used to produce electricity at many places. Although the technologies for solar energy are still costly but future prospects look bright.
samples.question: What is the current cost status of solar energy technologies?

samples.context: Fuel cell is another development which may help in replacing the internal combustion engines from automobiles. Hydrogen is being used as fuel in buses and cars in many countries.
samples.question: What might replace internal combustion engines?

samples.context: Hydrogen, when used as a fuel, produces water as a byproduct. Thus, hydrogen can be an environmentally-friendly fuel.
samples.question: What is produced when hydrogen is used as fuel?

samples.context: Scientists are working on developing some alternate energy sources so that dependency on coal and petroleum can be reduced. Some examples are given below: Solar energy is being used to produce electricity at many places.
samples.question: Why do we need alternate energy sources?

samples.context: Although the technologies for solar energy are still costly but future prospects look bright. Fuel cell is another development which may help in replacing the internal combustion engines from automobiles.
samples.question: What potential does solar energy technology have?

samples.context: Hydrogen is being used as fuel in buses and cars in many countries. Hydrogen, when used as a fuel, produces water as a byproduct.
samples.question: How is hydrogen used in transportation?
